LanguageData.PerformedPlay.label: performed play
LanguageData.PerformedPlay.rulePack.rulesStrings.3: image->[LEAD_nameDef] gazing into the abyss of the human soul whilst [SUPPORT_nameDef] dances, holiding a steady look of ennui [circumstance_group].
LanguageData.PerformedPlay.rulePack.rulesStrings.4: image->[LEAD_nameDef] and [SUPPORT_nameDef] gazing with love at each other from across the stage [circumstance_group].
LanguageData.PerformedPlay.rulePack.rulesStrings.5: image->[SUPPORT_nameDef] fluffing [SUPPORT_possessive] line as [LEAD_nameDef] looks on distainfully [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.PerformedPlay.rulePack.rulesStrings.6: image->[LEAD_nameDef] quickly covering up as [SUPPORT_nameDef] fluffs [SUPPORT_possessive] line [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.PerformedPlay.rulePack.rulesStrings.7: image->[LEAD_nameDef] quickly covering up as [SUPPORT_nameDef] fluffs [SUPPORT_possessive] line [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.PerformedPlay.rulePack.rulesStrings.8: image->[LEAD_nameDef] delivering a tearful soliloquy as [SUPPORT_nameDef] gazes on adoringly [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.PerformedPlay.rulePack.rulesStrings.9: image->[LEAD_nameDef] delivering a tearful soliloquy as [SUPPORT_nameDef] gazes on adoringly [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.PerformedPlay.rulePack.rulesStrings.10: image->[LEAD_nameDef] yelling a rousing battlecry from a different play, while [SUPPORT_nameDef] picks the petals from a rose one at a time [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.PerformedPlay.rulePack.rulesStrings.12: circumstance_phrase->to the uproarious cheering of the audience
LanguageData.PerformedPlay.rulePack.rulesStrings.14: circumstance_phrase->whilst the audience stare in rapt silence.
LanguageData.PerformedPlay.rulePack.rulesStrings.15: circumstance_phrase->, both ignoring the muffalo that someone let in with great professionalism
LanguageData.PerformedPlay.rulePack.rulesStrings.16: circumstance_phrase->, with each wearing the other's costume due to a stage management error
LanguageData.PerformedPlay.rulePack.rulesStrings.17: desc_sentence->[LEAD_nameDef] has let a single tear roll down [LEAD_possessive] cheek
LanguageData.PerformedPlay.rulePack.rulesStrings.18: desc_sentence->[LEAD_nameDef]'s costume has been torn in a moment of passion
LanguageData.PerformedPlay.rulePack.rulesStrings.19: desc_sentence->[LEAD_nameDef]'s stance is bold, and unapologetic.
LanguageData.PerformedPlay.rulePack.rulesStrings.20: desc_sentence->[SUPPORT_nameDef] is trying to upstage [LEAD_nameDef] with flamoboyant gestures.
LanguageData.PerformedMusic.label: performed music
LanguageData.PerformedMusic.rulePack.rulesStrings.2: image->[PAWN_nameDef] hammering the piano keys forcefully [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.PerformedMusic.rulePack.rulesStrings.3: image->[PAWN_nameDef] sending the sheet music flying [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.PerformedMusic.rulePack.rulesStrings.5: circumstance_phrase->while the audience watch in silent appreciation
LanguageData.PerformedMusic.rulePack.rulesStrings.6: circumstance_phrase->as the audience applaud the skilled performance
LanguageData.PerformedMusic.rulePack.rulesStrings.7: circumstance_phrase->as the lively audience sing along tunelessly
LanguageData.PerformedMusic.rulePack.rulesStrings.8: desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] plays with [PAWN_possessive] eyes closed, apparently unaware of what is around [PAWN_objective].
LanguageData.PerformedMusic.rulePack.rulesStrings.9: desc_sentence->[PAWN_possessive] expression is one of passion and determination.
LanguageData.PerformedMusic.rulePack.rulesStrings.10: desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] plays with a rhythm and a force that is frightening.
LanguageData.PerformedMusic.rulePack.rulesStrings.12: desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] is depicted with [PAWN_possessive] arms raised high above the keys, ready to strike with force.
LanguageData.PerformedMusic.rulePack.rulesStrings.13: desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] is rendered with an unimaginative halo of musical notes.
LanguageData.PerformedMusic.rulePack.rulesStrings.14: desc_sentence->A [animal] peeks out from inside the piano.
LanguageData.PerformedComedy.label: performed comedy
LanguageData.PerformedComedy.rulePack.rulesStrings.3: image->[PAWN_nameDef] dropping in a perfectly constructed malapropism [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.PerformedComedy.rulePack.rulesStrings.5: image->[PAWN_nameDef] picking on an audience member [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.PerformedComedy.rulePack.rulesStrings.7: circumstance_phrase->as those watching are overcome with paroxysms of laughter
LanguageData.PerformedComedy.rulePack.rulesStrings.9: desc_sentence->[PAWN_nameDef] clings to the microphone as though [PAWN_possessive] life depended on it.
LanguageData.PerformedComedy.rulePack.rulesStrings.10: desc_sentence->[PAWN_nameDef] is swinging the microphone around like a weapon.
LanguageData.PerformedComedy.rulePack.rulesStrings.12: desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] is weeping, while several [animal]s wander in unexpectedly.
LanguageData.PerformedComedy.rulePack.rulesStrings.13: desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] is rendered with an extra face on the back of [PAWN_possessive] head, which is wearing an expression of self-doubt.
LanguageData.PerformedComedy.rulePack.rulesStrings.14: desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] is depicted with the voices of the other colonists orbiting [PAWN_pronoun] head.
